hadiths.english_translation: Narrated that he saw with Urwah al-Bariqi approximately seventy horses. And Urwah who reported from the Prophet ﷺ said: Horses have goodness fastened in their forelocks until the Day of Resurrection.

hadiths.english_translation: Narrated by Samurah ibn Jundub: When Samurah became ill with the illness in which he died, intense cold overtook him. So I lit fire for him and he placed a brazier before him and a brazier behind him and a brazier at his right and a brazier at his left. He said: So he did not benefit from that and was saying: How will I deal with what is inside my belly? So it remained like that until he died.

narrators.full_name: Wahb ibn Jarir ibn Hazim al-Razi

potential_issues.issue: Abu Yazid al-Madini is graded saduq rather than thiqah

hadiths.IISGrade: Acceptable

hadiths.english_translation: Narrated from al-Harith ibn Hassan: We went out intending to see the Prophet ﷺ. We entered the mosque and behold it was filled with people. And there was a black banner wavering. And Bilal was girt with the sword. He said: I asked: What is the matter with people today? They said: This is the Prophet ﷺ who intends to send Amr ibn al-As on an expedition.

hadiths.english_translation: Narrated from Abu al-Jarud: Verily the Prophet ﷺ said: Verily it (hadith transmission) is a trust (amanah), and verily this knowledge is a trust with God. So whosoever preserves it and passes it on faithfully, he will meet his Lord on the Day of Resurrection with his face white (honored), and whosoever betrays it and does not pass it on faithfully, he will meet his Lord with his face black on the Day of Resurrection.

chainIssues: Isra'il ibn Yunus is classified as a mudallis (category 2), but this category is generally not problematic and his 'an transmission is widely accepted

potential_issues.issue: Isra'il ibn Yunus is a known mudallis of category 2
potential_issues.impact: Isra'il ibn Yunus is classified as a mudallis (category 2 by Ibn Hajar). However, category 2 mudallis are generally not considered problematic, and his 'an transmission is widely accepted by scholars. This does not significantly weaken the chain.

hadiths.IISGrade: Sound
Topics: Consequences of suicide in the afterlife

hadiths.english_translation: And some say he is the son of Sa'id. Qais ibn Abi Hazim narrated from him.
